scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run prisma-deploy && npm run prisma-seed && npm run run:dist
scripts.start-standalone:frontend: ./wait-for-it.sh -s 127.0.0.1:4466 -- cross-env DEBUG=botium* PRISMA_ENDPOINT=http://127.0.0.1:4466/box/standalone PRISMA_SECRET=mysecret123 JWT_SECRET=jwtsecret123 npm start
